thread.title: BRIEF-Willdan Group - ‍ComEd Selects Co To Implement Expanded Energy-Efficient Data Centers Offering​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Willdan Group - ‍ComEd Selects Co To Implement Expanded Energy-Efficient Data Centers Offering​

organizations.name: comed selects co to implement expanded energy-efficient data centers offering​ feb

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Willdan Group Inc:
* WILLDAN GROUP INC - ‍COMED HAS SELECTED WILLDAN TO IMPLEMENT ITS EXPANDED ENERGY-EFFICIENT DATA CENTERS OFFERING​
* WILLDAN GROUP INC - ‍ONE-YEAR CONTRACT WITH THREE OPTION YEARS AIMS TO DELIVER 174,000 MWH OF ENERGY SAVINGS OVER NEXT FOUR YEARS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
